context_bundle.summary: Invoice Processing Pattern: Multi-channel capture (email/SharePoint/scan) -> AI/OCR extraction (vendor, amount, PO, terms) -> Validation (vendor master, PO match, duplicates) -> Intelligent routing (amount thresholds, cost center) -> Approval workflow (escalate 48hr) -> Payment batch -> Archive with audit trail. 15min->2min per invoice, $156K/yr value.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Monitor inbox + SharePoint for invoices. 2. AI Builder extract fields. 3. Match to PO (<10% variance). 4. Route by amount: <$1K=mgr, <$10K=director, >$10K=VP. 5. Create payment batch on approval. 6. Archive to SharePoint.
common_patterns: Duplicate check: Same vendor + invoice# + amount within 90 days
Anomaly flags: >10% over PO, new vendor, unusual terms
known_errors: New vendors need manual setup first
OCR accuracy needs training on your invoice formats
PO matching fails without clean PO data
Early payment discount logic needs payment term parsing
